Name: Verdant Surge
Story Background: Deep within the heart of the enchanted forest, the druids harness the power of nature to protect their realm. Verdant Surge represents their ability to channel the raw energy of the earth.
Ability: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If that creature is a Druid, it also gains trample until end of turn.
Appearance Description: The card depicts a majestic druid standing amidst a vibrant forest, with swirling green energy emanating from their outstretched hand. The surrounding flora and fauna seem to come alive, as if responding to the druid's call.
